column4: Using karmic, I am trying to get wifi working with a realtek 8172 wifi
card (thinkpad T500 laptop). I installed the windows driver (8192se,
thats what the pre-installed vista uses) with ndisgtk. "ndiswrapper
-l" shows the driver is loaded and the hardware is detected, but
network manager doesn't appear to see it. What can I do?
Please don't flood, use http://paste.ubuntu.com to paste, don't use Enter as punctuation.
